title: Can we put Darius, Dianna and Fizz on this weeks free week plz :D
body: I think that all the champions for the current free week are really boring. there all being played before we need to get some of the newer champs on the free week, or frequently used.

replies.body: Or you could purchase and unlock champs you consider to be fun, like everyone else.
Hey there's champs on free rotation that I don't like, get x, y, and z on the rotation cause my opinion is what matters

"Can we put x champion, y champion and z champion on this free week because I don't have them?"

m8ey

The Free Champion's change week; if there's no new champions you wish to play, play some old for this week, and hope there's someone new next week. 

You can also purchase any champion included the one listed from the store.
Perhaps try making a group of 5 and trying for the x16 Party IP bonus, and you'll be there in no time.
